test_message: Animal Profile: Max - 3 year old Labrador mix. Energy level: High. Exercise needs: 60-90 minutes daily vigorous exercise. Socialization: Friendly with people and dogs, needs social interaction. Training: Basic commands, pulls on leash, needs continued training. Space requirements: Needs room to move, benefits from yard access. Special needs: None.

energy_assessment.play_requirements: Max requires daily vigorous activity, such as running, hiking, or long sessions of active play/fetch.
energy_assessment.details: A high-energy Labrador mix, Max thrives with at least 60-90 minutes of vigorous exercise every day. Insufficient activity may lead to restlessness or undesired behaviors.

space_assessment.mobility_needs: Needs a home with access to a secure, spacious yard and room to move freely.
space_assessment.details: Max will benefit most from a house with a fenced yard; apartments or small spaces may not provide enough room for healthy outlets.

socialization_assessment.details: Outgoing and sociable, Max quickly bonds with humans and other dogs. Positive, regular engagement is important for his well-being.

medical_assessment.details: No known health or special medical requirements; standard preventative care and routine checkups recommended.

training_assessment.details: Max knows basic commands but needs ongoing training for leash control and more complex instructions. Positive reinforcement methods are suggested.

temperament_profile.ideal_environment: Active household with plenty of space and people or other pets for companionship.
temperament_profile.behavioral_notes: Max is best suited to homes where he will not be left alone for long periods and can participate in family activities.

household_requirements: willingness to provide daily vigorous exercise
time for continued training and social interaction

red_flags: prospective adopters unable to commit to daily exercise requirements
success_factors: opportunities for socialization with people and dogs
